EmailTemplate.name: Opportunity moved from 99%
EmailTemplate.subject: ACTION REQUIRED: ({!Opportunity.Name}) Has Moved Down From 99%
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Opportunity.Name} has moved down from 99% because one or more fields are incorrect/incomplete. Please review the Closed Won Checklist (hyperlink of our internal checklist sheet) to complete the appropriate fields in Salesforce before moving the Sales Stage to 99%.
Link to Opportunity : {!Opportunity.Link}
